440713500277001374.Text: All right then.  If you have a change of heart, let me know.  I barely escaped from the draugrs the first time I rescued Oddfrid from Kolbjorn Barrow.  I'm not sure I want to risk my life again, no matter how much I enjoy Oddfrid's company.  Leave me now, %PCClass.  As you can see, I have a lot of cleaning up to do.

701528240255274606.Text: Excellent.  Of course, I knew you were going to help me.  I am a seer after all.  Now, Kolbjorn Barrow lies to the southeast of here, near the coast.  I need you to enter the barrow, find Oddfrid, and return her to me.  Do be careful, %PCClass.  The draugrs are fast, vicious and entirely without remorse.  Go now.  I will eagerly await your return.

49258192596714542.Text: Excellent.  Of course, I knew you were going to help me.  I am a seer after all.  Now, Kolbjorn Barrow lies to the southeast of here, near the coast.  I need you to enter the barrow, find Oddfrid, and return her to me.  Do be careful, %PCClass.  The draugrs are fast, vicious and entirely without remorse.  Go now.  I will eagerly await your return.

14622183191923031526.Text: My entire family was lost at sea a few months ago, and now I am all alone. My only companion is Oddfrid White-Lip.  She talks to me.  She tells me things, tells me the future.  I rescued her from Kolbjorn Barrow many months ago.  But she's been kidnapped by a draugr who lives in Kolbjorn! %PCClass, will you go to the barrow and rescue Oddfrid White-Lip?  If you do, then Oddfrid will help me reveal your future!
Script: Choice "Sorry, but no." 1 "I'll rescue Oddfrid for you, Geilir." 2

1690423295912415616.Text: With my family gone, I am all alone, except for Oddfrid White-Lip.  She talks to me.  She tells me the future.  But she's been kidnapped by a draugr who lives in Kolbjorn! %PCClass, will you go to the barrow and rescue Oddfrid White-Lip?  If you do, then Oddfrid will help me reveal your future!  And, as a show of good faith, I'll also reverse Thormoor's curse!
Script: Choice "Sorry, but no." 1 "I'll rescue Oddfrid for you, Geilir." 3

2692228918321730200.Text: Oddfrid White-Lip is with me once again, thanks to you, %PCName.
